response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premier product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Considering its significance and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive opportunity for you to acquire this masterpiece. My proposal is to offer you this extraordinary item for $1,100,000. This price not only reflects its true worth but also provides you with an exceptional value proposition. I believe this offer presents a unique chance for both of us to benefit from this remarkable product. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or proceed with the purchase.", "product_price": 1100000}
